snippet: Newton, Carolina’s quarterback, said the mistakes made in a win over Arizona must be eliminated if the team hopes to advance further in the playoffs.
abstract: NFL Roundup; Arizona Cardinals defensive coordinator Todd Bowles is free to interview for New York Jets head coaching job after Cardinals loss to Carolina Panthers in NFC playoff; other football news noted.
lead_paragraph: Newton, Carolina’s quarterback, said the mistakes made in a win over Arizona must be eliminated if the team hopes to advance further in the playoffs.

headline.main: Cam Newton Realizes the Panthers Have Plenty of Room for Improvement on Offense
headline.print_headline: With Cardinals’ Loss, Defensive Coordinator Is Free to Interview for Jets’ Vacancy
